name: Hunter.ai
description:
Year 2997, artificial intelligence has taken over just about every task possible, including space combat. Some of them have gone rogue and wreak havoc around the galaxy! It is up to you to take them all out!

  • Endless gameplay!
  • Pew pew! Missiles!
  • Hack and take over other ships!
  • Autosave for those rage quit moments!
  • Gamepad recommended!

Solo student project, some assets were used for sfx, input and backgrounds

HDRI backgrounds: https://www.artstation.com/marketplace/p/mA5z/almost-6-free-space-hdri-environme...
